Feature Notes:
Bonus Feat: +1 General Feat
Deep Drinker: Increased Drunken Ki effects
Unarmed Strike: Has Improved Unarmed Strike features
Drunken Ki: Each alcoholic drink gives 2 temporary Ki Point (9 max) for 1 hr/May spend 1 Ki Point for 5' swift action move w/out provoking AOO when Drunken Ki Pool is not empty
Fast Drinker: May drink for temporary Ki as a swift action
Improved Ki Throw: May use Ki Throw for -4 bull rush on another target
Ki Pool: 14 points refills w/8 hours rest
Ki Throw: May throw foe into adjacent unoccupied square w/out provoking AOO after successful unarmed trip
Timeless Body: Suffers no aging penalties
Tongue Of The Sun And Moon: May speak w/any living creature

Combat
Hit Points: 130 Initiative: +3 Armor Class: 22 Damage Reduction: 10/Chaotic Attacks Per Round: 3 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +15/+16/+18 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +21/38
Armor Proficiency: None Shield Proficiency: None Weapon Proficiency: Limited
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Brass Knuckles (+16 d3+1 x2@20); Heavy Crossbow (+18 d10 x2@19 R120'); Shortspear (+16 d6+1 x2@20 R20'); Unarmed (+16 2d10+1 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Armor Class Bonus: +9 AC/+9 CMD
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Improved Critical (Greataxe): x2 Greataxe Threat Range
Improved Critical (Scimitar): x2 Scimitar Threat Range
Improved Critical (Siangham): x2 Siangham Threat Range
Improved Critical (Starknife): x2 Starknife Threat Range
Maneuver Training: +5 CMB
Perfect Self: DR 10/chaotic
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Unarmed Strike: Unarmed hit inflicts 2d10 HP
Cockatrice Strike: Crit on full-round unarmed attack petrifies dazed, flat-footed, paralyzed, staggered, stunned, or unconscious foe (DC 24 Fort neg)
Combat Expertise: May suffer up to -4 attack to gain equal AC bonus
Condition Fist: May use Stunning Fist to inflict fatigued/sickened/staggered/blind/deafened/paralyzed
Drunken Resilience: DR 3/- when Drunken Ki Pool is not empty
Drunken Strength: May spend 1 Ki Point for +1d6 HP damage when Drunken Ki Pool is not empty; may spend 2-4 Drunken Ki Points to increase up to 4d6
Elemental Fist: Unarmed hit inflicts +1d6 HP of choice of energy type 1/rd 20/dy
Firewater Breath: May spend 4 Ki Points when Drunken Ki Pool is not empty for R30' cone from alcohol drink that inflicts 20d6 HP fire (DC 24 Ref half)
Flurry Of Blows: Full-round +19/+19/+14/+14/+9/+9/+4 monk weapon attacks; may spend 1 Ki Point for additional +19
Gorgon's Fist: Unarmed attack vs. slowed foe staggers (DC 24 Fort neg)
Greater Two-Weapon Fighting: May make third off-hand attack at -10 penalty
Improved Bull Rush: Bull Rush provokes no AOO, gains +2 Bull Rush check and CMD
Improved Critical (Two-Bladed Sword): x2 Two-Bladed Sword Threat Range
Improved Trip: Trip provokes no AOO, gains +2 Trip check and CMD
Improved Two-Weapon Fighting: Gains second off-hand attack at -5 penalty
Improved Unarmed Strike: Unarmed attack provokes no AOO, may deal lethal damage
Ki Dodge: May spend 1 Ki Point for +4 AC
Ki Strike: Unarmed attack is magic/cold iron/silver/lawful/adamantine
Medusa's Wrath: May make 2 extra unarmed attacks vs. diminished-capacity foe
Perfect Strike: May use best of 2 rolls when attacking w/kama, nunchaku, quarterstaff, sai or siangham 20/dy
Power Attack: May suffer up to -4 attack to gain dbl damage bonus
Punishing Kick: Successful kick attack inflicts choice of 5' push or knocked prone (DC 24 neg) 20/dy
Quivering Palm: Unarmed strike kills 1/dy (DC 24 Fort neg)
Scorpion Style: Unarmed hit slows foe to 5' for 4 rd (DC 24 Fort neg)
Stunning Fist: Unarmed strike inflicts stunned for 1 rd 20/dy (DC 24 Fort neg)
Touch Of Serenity: May forego attack damage to prevent foe attack or spellcasting for 1 rd (DC 24 Will neg) 20/dy
Two-Weapon Fighting: Reduces on-hand penalty by 2 and off-hand by 6
Save: Fortitude: +16; Reflex: +15; Will: +16
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +3
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +4
Drunken Courage: Immune to fear when Drunken Ki Pool is not empty
Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Heart Of The Fields: May ignore fatigued or exhausted effect 1/dy
Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Perfect Self: Treated as outsider for magic saves
Slow Fall: Takes no damage from falling
Magic
Magic Notes:
Abundant Step: May spend 2 Ki Points to teleport self 1200'
Wholeness Of Body: May spend 2 Ki Points to heal 20 HP to self
